! gopm -c gopmconfig --quit-delay 0 -p gopmextra/foo.cue
stderr 'error:cannot load CUE path "gopmextra/foo.cue": path does not exist'

-- gopmconfig/config.cue --
package config

config: grpc_server: {
	network: "unix"
	address: "gopm.socket"
}

-- gopmextra/options.cue --
package config

config: programs: sleeper: {
	command: """
		echo hello
		"""
}
